body.directions: Read each word or phrase in Chinese, and then answer the question that follows.

body.quiz: Which of the following is least like the same type of activity as the one indicated by the word presented?
body.correct: Job beautifully done, especially recognizing the characters in the choices without the assistance of pinyin. Awesome! 散步 sànbù means to walk as a leisure activity, and of the activities in the choices, 洗碗 xǐwǎn (to wash dishes) is least like a pastime as a leisure walk.
body.incorrect: Very close. Think about what activity the word represents. Then read the choices to identify the activities they represent and consider which one may not make you feel the same way as the activity in the question does.

body.quiz: Which of the following items in the images can be used with the verb indicated by the word presented?
body.answer: Image of a piano©iStock
options: Image of a basketball©iStock
Image of someone playing music©iStock
Image of a videogame controller©iStock
body.correct: Outstanding job! 演奏 yǎnzòu means “to play (a musical instrument).” Of the choices, the most suitable item that can be placed after 演奏 yǎnzòu would be the piano.
body.incorrect: Not quite…First identify the meaning of the word and how it’s used. Then, look at the images to see which one meets the criteria.

body.quiz: Which of the following sentences can best be completed with the word presented?
body.answer: 我每天上午练_____。Wǒ měitiān shàngwǔ liàn_____.
options: 你下午要去买_____。Nǐ xiàwǔ yào qù mǎi _____.
我妹妹今天晚餐想吃_____。Wǒ mèimei jīntiān wǎncān xiǎngchī_____.
她星期天要打扫_____。Tā xīngqītiān yào dǎsǎo_____.
body.correct: You got it! 瑜伽 yújiā means “yoga,” and the best verb to go with it in the sentences is 练 liàn, which is short for 练习 liànxí (to practice).
body.incorrect: So close! Think about the meaning of this word and which verb should be used for it, and then review the sentences to see which one is most suitable in both meaning and structure.

body.quiz: In which place does this activity most likely take place?
body.correct: Very nice job! 玩电子游戏 wán diànziyóuxì means “to play videogames,” and the most suitable place for it is the family living room. You might play videogames in your classroom.
body.incorrect: Not quite…Think about what activity this word represents. Then review the choices to see in which location you are most likely to see this activity carried out.

body.quiz: Which of the following verbs can be used with the word presented?
body.correct: Job very well done! 演唱会 yǎnchànghuì means “concert,” and two verbs that can be used before it to indicate attending a concert are 看 kàn (to watch) and 听 tīng (to listen to).
body.incorrect: Oops…Consider the meaning of this word and which verb can be used with it. Then, review the one-character verbs in the choices to see which one is more suitable.
